subsections.title: Coordinating with External Authorities
subsections.summary: In severe cases or when required, the ICC may work with external authorities, such as law enforcement or regulatory agencies, to address the complaint effectively.

subsections.title: Ensuring Non-Retaliation
subsections.summary: The ICC ensures that the complainant and witnesses are protected from any form of retaliation as a result of filing a complaint or participating in the investigation.
